09:13 <tmortagne> evalica: Hi  
09:14 <tmortagne> you may want to either put the whole wiki as favorite or disable autowatch, your watchlist object is starting to be pretty big :)  
09:14 <tmortagne> (in xwiki.org)  
09:14 <evalica> tmortagne: I don't remember to have any settings - not sure where and how I can disable the feature :) let me look  
09:15 <tmortagne> in your profile  
09:15 <tmortagne> it's enabled by default  
09:16 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
09:16 <evalica> now it would have been nice to have batch operations on livetables  
09:16 <tmortagne> yep  
09:17 <tmortagne> it's a pain when you want to empty it for example  
09:17 <tmortagne> you can do it in object editor  
09:17 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
09:17 <evalica> yes :) objects is great - thanks tmortagne

11:02 <vmassol> has quit  
11:09 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
11:13 <gdelhumeau> Hi guys  
11:13 <gdelhumeau> I would like to begin the 5.4.2 release this afternoon, just after lunch  
11:13 <gdelhumeau> is everybody ok?  
11:13 <gdelhumeau> any blocker?  
11:13 <gdelhumeau> mflorea, tmortagne, vmassol1 ?  
11:14 <tmortagne> no blocker on my side  
11:15 <gdelhumeau> the build seems blocked here: http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-xmlrpc-5.4.x/  
11:16 <gdelhumeau> the bug is not affected  
11:16 <gdelhumeau> \*assigned  
11:16 <mflorea> it doesn't matter, it's still a blocker  
11:16 <gdelhumeau> Is already someone on there or should I assigned to me?  
11:17 <mflorea> first we need to decide if it's really a blocker or not. Then if it's a blocker find someone to fix it.  
11:17 <mflorea> besides that, as you can see from the list, I have a lot of issues planned for 5.4.2 that I couldn't find time to close.. We need to decide what to do with them. Let me remove some that are less important  
11:19 <gdelhumeau> vmassol1: mflorea: is it better to remove some requirements for 5.4.2 and maybe do a 5.4.3 or to postpone 5.4.2?  
11:19 <vmassol1> sorry in a meeting now  
11:19 <vmassol1> generally speaking it depends on the delay  
11:19 <tmortagne> indeed there is XWIKI-10070  
11:19 <vmassol1> (didn't read above)  
11:19 <vmassol1> is now known as <vmassol>  
11:27 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
11:28 <ClemensR> this space copy thing is quite old, I wonder if folks might be able to for it until one more release ... unlike the "cannot upgrade to 5.3" issues  
11:29 <ClemensR> (just my 2 cents as I hang out here, today too ...)  
11:43 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki

17:43 <vmassol> sburjan: hi, releasing a multimodule is the same as releasing a single module with maven  
17:45 <sburjan> vmassol: thanks, I'll try to release the Activiti integration today  
17:45 <vmassol> cool

18:27 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
18:28 <sburjan> vmassol: it seems I am unable to login to nexus.xwiki.org, could you reset the password for my username ? I can't remember my username exactly, it's either sorinello or sburjan, could you check please ?  
18:29 <sburjan> also my e-mail address has changed in the meantime  
18:39 <KermitTheFragger> has quit  
18:39 <vmassol> sburjan: ok checking  
18:39 <gdelhumeau> mflorea: how much time do you need to finish your issues labeled roadmap54 ?

18:41 <vmassol> sburjan: sorinello  
18:45 <woshilapin> has quit

18:52 <vmassol> has quit  
18:53 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
18:58 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
18:58 <sburjan> vmassol: could you promote my artifacts from nexus to maven.xwiki.org ?  
19:02 <vmassol> sburjan: yes  
19:03 <sburjan> I hope everything is ok :)  
19:03 <vmassol> done  
19:03 <vmassol> I hope too :)  
19:05 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
19:05 <sburjan> now should I create the extensions.org page for the -ui module ? is this the best practice ?  
19:06 <vmassol> you can create a single page for -ui  
19:06 <vmassol> and import it  
19:07 <sburjan> import it using http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ExtensionCode/ImportExtension and the artifact id ?  
19:07 <vmassol> yes
